member.name: STARTING_LCN_INPUT_BUFFER
member.summary: Contains the starting LCN to theFSCTL_GET_VOLUME_BITMAP control code.

member.name: STARTING_LCN_INPUT_BUFFER.StartingLcn
member.summary: The LCN from which the operation should start when describing a bitmap. This member will be rounded down to a file-system-dependent rounding boundary, and that value will be returned. Its value should be an integral multiple of eight.
